title: Gestures not available in system settings on pixel 2 xl running android 9
content:
Hi

Just reset my pixel 2 xl to factory defaults. On the reset, it turns back on the old buttom navigation. However, when going into settings, system, there is no longer a gesture menu point.  As a consequence i am a unsure on how to reactivate gestures.

Any suggestions?

Running:
Pixel 2 xl
Android 9 pq3a-190705.001
Danish language
